title: Development and validation of a nomogram for predicting occurrence of severe case in children hospitalized with influenza A (H1N1) infection during the post-COVID-19 era
content:
Publication date: 15 August 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 15

Author(s): Hai-Feng Liu, Xiao-Zhong Hu, Cong-Yun Liu, Zheng-Hong Guo, Rui Lu, Mei Xiang, Ya-Yu Wang, Zhao-Qing Yin, Min Wang, Ming-Ze Sui, Jia-Wu Yang, Hong-Min Fu
